revision.text:
{{codepointer|r=Strife|Weapon}} '''A_SelectPiece'''
(''no parameter'')
Jumps forward a number of frames based on the number of sigil pieces the weapon represents when dropped. This codepointer is restricted to {{Class|Sigil}} and derived classes.
